text: Yεlima: “Ŋuna (Naawuni) n-nyɛ Nyɛŋda Ŋun yɛn tooi siɣisi O daazaaba na yi zuɣusaa, bee yi napona gbinni, bee ka O chɛ ka yi namgbana woli, ka yi leei ninvuɣu koŋkoba, ka chɛ ka yi shɛba lam biɛrim taba sani. (Yaa nyini Annabi)! Tɔ! Yulimi Ti (Tinim’ Naawuni) ni kahigiri dalirinim’ shεm, domin achiika! Bɛ ni leei ban baŋ
